channel.title: bash on Harshal Rathore
channel.description: Recent content in bash on Harshal Rathore

item.title: Linux SHELL Guide
item.description: Linux SHELL Guide Shows all hidden files and folders along with normal ones. 1 ls -a list lot of information about non-hidden files and directories 1 la -l list above info for hidden files and directories too 1 ls -la OR ls -l -a to switch to a dir same as cd but it just saves the path from which you came 1 pushd <path> to switch back to dir from which you came with pushd.
